item.title: Paul Klee made visible at Tate
item.author: Julia Zimmermann,
item.description: Making visible: what an unimaginative name for an art exhibition! – This was my first thought, but the Paul Klee exhibition in the Tate Modern surprisingly deserves that name. Through a collection of pictures it conveys a lot more than “just” art: the artist, the context and of course the idea …
